document.full_text: as the regular season reaches a climax, it has become a case of do-or-die for stanley cup champions the chicago blackhawks, who lead a desperate pack of teams making a late push to crash the nhl post-season party.
document.title: nhl playoff party gatecrashers vie for position
lines_and_colors: as the regular season reaches a climax, it has become a case of do-or-die for stanley cup champions the chicago blackhawks, who lead a desperate pack of teams making a late push to crash the nhl post-season party.
